p.span: Spooner High School Staff have a message they would like to share with all of their students. #SpoonerProud

SES teachers have a special message for all their students. Watch the video to see it up close:
#SpoonerProud #weloveyou #wemissyou #webelieveinyou
Thank you to Burnett Dairy for your donation of cheese for our school meals! Also, thank you to Bruce Chell Trucking of Siren for volunteering to deliver the cheese!
SASD students took part in a heart hunt! Check out all these awesome sidewalks, signs, and windows! Keep spreading joy and making others smile! #SpoonerProud #hearthunters #washburncojoyhunt ...
SASD students took part in a heart hunt! Check out all these awesome sidewalks, signs, and windows! Keep spreading joy and making others smile! #SpoonerProud #hearthunters #washburncojoyhunt ...

Keep up the good work! The WI Department of Health Services shared the following information indicating Safer at Home is preventing the spread of COVID-19. ...

Spooner friends- Chromebook/ homework pickup for grades 5-6 today (Tuesday) until 7pm. Wednesday & Thursday grades 3-8, 7am - 7pm at the Alternative school next to SMS! #SpoonerProud
